title: Task 1: Explain how a work demonstrates continuity within an artistic tradition, style, or practice.
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response. Each point is earned independently.
descriptions: Response does NOT accurately use any examples of specific VISUAL evidence to explain HOW the seated boxer demonstrates continuity with earlier sculptural traditions from the culture in which it was created.
Response accurately uses ONE example of specific VISUAL evidence to explain HOW the seated boxer demonstrates continuity with earlier sculptural traditions from the culture in which it was created.
Response accurately uses TWO examples of specific VISUAL evidence to explain HOW the seated boxer demonstrates continuity with earlier sculptural traditions from the culture in which it was created.

title: Task 2: Explain how a work demonstrates change within an artistic tradition, style, or practice.
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response. Each point is earned independently.
descriptions: Response does NOT accurately use any examples of specific VISUAL evidence to explain HOW the seated boxer demonstrates change from earlier sculptural traditions from the culture in which it was created.
Response accurately uses ONE example of specific VISUAL evidence to explain HOW the seated boxer demonstrates change from earlier sculptural traditions from the culture in which it was created.
Response accurately uses TWO examples of specific VISUAL evidence to explain HOW the seated boxer demonstrates change from earlier sculptural traditions from the culture in which it was created.

title: Task 3: Explain why a work of art demonstrates change within an artistic tradition, style, or practice.
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response. Each point is earned independently.
descriptions: The response does NOT accurately use any examples of specific CONTEXTUAL evidence to explain WHY the seated boxer deviates from earlier traditions for depicting the male figure.
The response accurately uses ONE example of specific CONTEXTUAL evidence to explain WHY the seated boxer deviates from earlier traditions for depicting the male figure.
The response accurately uses TWO examples of specific CONTEXTUAL evidence to explain WHY the seated boxer deviates from earlier traditions for depicting the male figure.
